item.title: Reboot
item.description: I've read many times that the key to success is to do things and tell people. In the new decade, I am going to put much more effort into the “tell people” part.
item.content:
I've read many times that the key to success is to do things and tell people.

In the new decade, I am going to put much more effort into the “tell people” part.
